services.title: What We Build
services.subtitle: Every line of code written for you

customSolutions.title: Built From Scratch
customSolutions.description: No WordPress. No templates. Every project starts with a blank file and ends with code that does exactly what you need.

webDev.title: Websites & Web Apps
webDev.description: Fast, secure sites that work on every device and every browser.
webDev.longDescription: From one-page sites to complex business tools. We write every line of code by hand, test it thoroughly, and make sure it works perfectly for your users.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Stop doing the same task twice. Let computers handle the boring work.
automation.longDescription: We build scripts that save you hours each week. Data collection, file processing, report generation - if it's repetitive, we can automate it.

seo.title: Search Engine Optimization
seo.description: Get found when people search for what you do.
seo.longDescription: We build SEO into every project from day one. Clean code, fast loading, proper structure - everything Google wants to see.

ecommerce.title: Online Stores
ecommerce.description: Sell more with a store that actually works for your customers.
ecommerce.longDescription: Secure payments, simple checkout, and inventory that updates automatically. Everything you need to sell online, nothing you don't.

consulting.title: Technology Advice
consulting.description: Not sure what you need? We'll help you figure it out.
consulting.longDescription: Skip the tech jargon. We'll help you choose tools that solve your actual problems and won't break when your business grows.

maintenance.title: Ongoing Support
maintenance.description: We stick around. Your site stays fast, secure, and up-to-date.
maintenance.longDescription: Launch is just the beginning. We handle updates, fix issues, and make changes when you need them. No monthly contracts required.

hero.title:
Designed to dominate. 
 Built to endure.
hero.subtitle: We build custom websites and web applications that actually get results. No templates, no shortcuts, just code that works.

nanobid.title: NanoBid - Auction Platform
nanobid.subtitle: Complete auction system
nanobid.description: A custom auction platform built from scratch in PHP for a local auction house.
nanobid.summaryText: Built a complete auction system from the ground up. Handles timed auctions, bidding, payments, and user management. Runs on a custom PHP framework we built specifically for this project.
nanobid.challengeText: The auction house needed their own system instead of paying expensive third-party fees. They needed something reliable that could handle real money transactions.
nanobid.solutionText: Built a secure auction platform with custom PHP, MySQL database, and Bootstrap frontend. Includes anti-sniping features, automatic bid increments, and secure payment processing.

kurs8klasisty.title: Kurs8Klasisty - English Course
kurs8klasisty.subtitle: E-learning platform
kurs8klasisty.description: A complete website and course platform for an English tutor.
kurs8klasisty.summaryText: Built a complete website for an English tutor including course pages, blog, and admin system. Students can access course materials and track their progress.
kurs8klasisty.challengeText: Needed a professional website that could handle course content, student management, and look great on mobile devices.
kurs8klasisty.solutionText: Created a custom PHP backend with MySQL database and responsive frontend. Includes content management system, student tracking, and mobile-optimized design.

hero.title: We Build Websites That Actually Work
hero.subtitle: Your website should be your hardest working employee. We make sure it is.

mission.title: Why not WordPress?
mission.text: Most websites are built from templates and look like everyone else's. We started TITANCODE because we believe your business deserves better. We write every line of code by hand, specifically for your needs. No shortcuts, no compromises. Just websites that work exactly how you need them to.

process.title: How We Work
process.step1_desc: We learn about your business and what you actually need.
process.step2_desc: We create a design that makes sense for your users.
process.step3_desc: We build it with clean code that won't break when you grow.
process.step4_desc: We test everything to make sure it works perfectly.
process.step5_desc: We handle the technical stuff so you can focus on your business.
process.step6_desc: We're here when you need changes or something breaks.

whyUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyUs.feature1_desc: No templates. Every project is built specifically for you.
whyUs.feature2_desc: Clean code that won't break when your business grows.
whyUs.feature3_desc: Fast sites that your customers will actually use.
whyUs.feature4_desc: You talk directly to the people building your site.
whyUs.feature5_desc: We use proven technologies that won't become obsolete.
whyUs.feature6_desc: Need changes? Something broken? We're here to help.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Let's build something that actually works for your business.

comparison.title: The Right Tool for the Job
comparison.subtitle: WordPress is a great starting point, but growing businesses need more.

custom.title: Custom Solution
custom.feature1_desc: We build your site from the ground up, eliminating the third-party plugin vulnerabilities that are a common target on WordPress.
custom.feature2_desc: No bloated themes or unnecessary code. Just a fast, clean, and efficient website that your users and Google will love.
custom.feature3_desc: Your website is a unique asset, built to your exact specifications without the constraints of templates or pre-built plugins.

wordpress.title: WordPress
wordpress.feature1_desc: Its popularity makes it a target. Security often depends on third-party plugins, which can introduce vulnerabilities if not managed carefully.
wordpress.feature2_desc: Easy-to-use page builders and numerous plugins can add 'code bloat,' leading to slower load times and a less optimal user experience.
wordpress.feature3_desc: While flexible, achieving a truly unique design or complex feature set often requires fighting against the template, adding complexity and cost.

comparison.conclusion_text: WordPress is an excellent tool for blogs and simple sites. But when your website is a critical business asset, a custom solution provides the security, performance, and scalability you need to grow. It's the difference between renting a space and owning the building.

techStack.title: Our Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: We build with modern, enterprise-grade tools to create future-proof websites.
techStack.nextjs_desc: Backed by Vercel, Next.js is the leading framework for building fast, scalable, and SEO-friendly React applications.
techStack.react_desc: Created and maintained by Meta (Facebook), React is the world's most popular library for building dynamic user interfaces.
techStack.typescript_desc: Developed by Microsoft, TypeScript adds a powerful layer of security and reliability to JavaScript, preventing common bugs.
techStack.javascript_desc: The foundational language of the web, we use its modern features to build interactive and engaging experiences.
techStack.php_desc: Powering a huge portion of the web, PHP remains a robust and reliable choice for server-side logic and database integration.
techStack.tailwind_desc: A utility-first CSS framework that allows for rapid development of custom designs without the bloat of traditional CSS libraries.

priceInclude.question: What's included in the price?
priceInclude.answer: Everything you need to get online: design, development, testing, hosting, domain, and SSL certificate for the first year. No hidden fees.

beginnerStart.question: I'm new to this. How do I start?
beginnerStart.answer: Just fill out our contact form. We'll explain everything in plain English - domains, hosting, costs. We've helped many people with no technical experience get online.

hostingIncluded.question: Is hosting included?
hostingIncluded.answer: Yes. Hosting is included for the first year. After that, it's typically 300-500 PLN per year depending on your needs.

renewalFees.question: Are there renewal fees?
renewalFees.answer: Yes, after the first year you'll pay for hosting and domain renewal. Usually 300-500 PLN annually.

quality.question: Will my website be good quality?
quality.answer: Yes. All our sites are optimized for speed and work well on all devices. We test everything thoroughly before launch.

ssl.question: Do I get an SSL certificate?
ssl.answer: Yes, all websites include SSL certificates for security. Your site will show as secure in browsers.

cms.question: Do you use WordPress?
cms.answer: No. We build everything from scratch. This gives you exactly what you need without the bloat and security issues that come with WordPress.

customization.question: Can I customize the packages?
customization.answer: Yes. Every package can be adjusted to fit your specific needs. Contact us to discuss your requirements.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Questions about your project? We're here to help.
